tile.name: sea_captain
tile.description: A weathered pirate captain with a scarred face, tattered coat, and a brass compass that glows faintly in the dark.

player.back_history: A once‑prominent sea‑captain, now a washed‑up scavenger, seeks the lost treasure of Khar‑Gul to restore his family’s honor and pay off a debt to a cruel merchant lord. Haunted by the memory of a drowned crew and driven by a desperate need for redemption, he ventures into the Abyssal Cove, hoping to find the fabled binding spell and the riches it promises.

tile_with_texture.name: sea_captain
tile_with_texture.description: A weathered pirate captain with a scarred face, tattered coat, and a brass compass that glows faintly in the dark.

texture.tileset_description: An orc with a hat covering his eyes. He's not holding anything. He seems strong.

items.description: The entrance to the Abyssal Cove is a shallow, moonlit corridor lined with cracked wooden planks and a rusted gate. The air smells of salt and damp earth, and the faint hum of distant waves can be heard. Light filters through cracks, illuminating patches of moss and the occasional glimmer of phosphorescent algae. This level is relatively safe, with only a few wandering sea‑folk and the occasional eel to contend with.
items.name: The Shallow Entrance

wall_tile.name: stone_wall_shallow
wall_tile.description: Rough stone walls covered in moss and seaweed.

floor_tile.name: stone_floor_shallow
floor_tile.description: Smooth wet stone floor slick with algae.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: stone_wall_shallow
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Rough stone walls covered in moss and seaweed.

texture.tileset_description: Stone brick wall.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: stone_floor_shallow
floor_tile_with_texture.description: Smooth wet stone floor slick with algae.

texture.tileset_description: Smooth stone tile floor.

items.description: Beyond the gate, the corridor widens into a maze of wrecked ship hulls and broken wooden bridges. The water rises to waist height, slick with algae that pulse faintly in blue and green. The smell of rotting timber and brine fills the air. Low, uneven lighting from broken lanterns and moonlight creates shifting shadows, while the sound of creaking timbers and distant splashes echoes through the cavern.
items.name: The Wrecked Passage

wall_tile.name: wrecked_wall
wall_tile.description: Cracked wooden beams and rusted metal.

floor_tile.name: wrecked_floor
floor_tile.description: Rough wooden planks and broken hulls.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: wrecked_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Cracked wooden beams and rusted metal.

texture.tileset_description: Broken iron railings.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: wrecked_floor
floor_tile_with_texture.description: Rough wooden planks and broken hulls.

texture.tileset_description: a wooden boat

items.description: The water here has begun to thicken, turning into a living, shifting mass that can swallow walkways. Mutated jellyfish drift lazily, their phosphorescent glow flickering. The air is thick with a bioluminescent mist that tingles the skin. The sound of bubbling water and the distant, low growl of unseen creatures creates an unsettling atmosphere.
items.name: The Corrupting Basin

wall_tile.name: corrupt_wall
wall_tile.description: Stone walls with swirling black water stains.

floor_tile.name: corrupt_floor
floor_tile.description: Waterlogged stone floor, slick with bioluminescent algae.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: corrupt_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Stone walls with swirling black water stains.

texture.tileset_description: Stone brick wall.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: corrupt_floor
floor_tile_with_texture.description: Waterlogged stone floor, slick with bioluminescent algae.

texture.tileset_description: A floor with some small stones scattered around it.

items.description: The corridor narrows into a cavernous chamber where the Black Maw's influence is strongest. The water is blackened, swirling with a faint violet glow. Sea‑wraiths glide silently, their translucent forms slipping through stone. The fog is thick, causing hallucinations. The air smells of ozone and decay, and the only light comes from the eerie glow of the mist.
items.name: The Maw's Maw

wall_tile.name: maw_chamber_wall
wall_tile.description: Stone walls etched with violet runes.

floor_tile.name: maw_chamber_floor
floor_tile.description: Slick black stone floor, slick with black water.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: maw_chamber_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Stone walls etched with violet runes.

texture.tileset_description: A stone wall with a door in the middle.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: maw_chamber_floor
floor_tile_with_texture.description: Slick black stone floor, slick with black water.

texture.tileset_description: A muddy floor.

items.description: At the heart of the cove, the walls seem to pulse with a living rhythm. The water is now a deep, dark ocean, its surface broken by waves that seem to move on their own. The bioluminescent mist is now a dense, oppressive fog that compels movement. The sound of roaring waves and the whisper of the Black Maw's voice echo through the chamber.
items.name: The Abyssal Depths

wall_tile.name: deep_cove_wall
wall_tile.description: Walls that pulse with living rhythm.

floor_tile.name: deep_cove_floor
floor_tile.description: Deep, dark ocean floor, slick with salt.

wall_tile_with_texture.name: deep_cove_wall
wall_tile_with_texture.description: Walls that pulse with living rhythm.

texture.tileset_description: Stone brick wall.

floor_tile_with_texture.name: deep_cove_floor
floor_tile_with_texture.description: Deep, dark ocean floor, slick with salt.

texture.tileset_description: A muddy floor.

items.description: The final level is a vast, abyssal void where the Black Maw itself manifests. The floor is a slick, black slab of stone, and the walls are carved with ancient runes that glow faintly. The air is charged with raw power, and the smell of burnt salt fills the space. The only light comes from the Maw's pulsing heart, a swirling vortex of violet and orange. The sound is a deafening roar, the culmination of all the cavern's whispers.
items.name: The Heart of the Black Maw

tile.name: black_maw_core

final_objective.back_history:
The Black Maw’s heart was once a living, sentient leviathan, its massive body a swirling vortex of dark water and raw, unbound power. Khar‑Gul, desperate to keep the beast from the Royal Navy, bound it to the abyss with a spell of containment, sealing its core deep within the cove’s darkest chamber. Over centuries the spell has frayed, allowing the Maw’s corruption to seep through cracks, turning water into a living menace and mind‑twisting fog into a living nightmare.

The core itself is the source of that corruption: a living crystal that feeds on the life force of the drowned, growing brighter as the Maw’s influence spreads. If left unchecked, the core will eventually break free, flooding the world with its malevolent tide. The only way to stop or harness the Maw is to retrieve the core and either re‑seal it with a new binding spell or use its power to command the abyss.

Thus the player must descend to the very bottom of the cove, confront the Maw’s twisted minions, and carry the Black Maw Core back to the entrance. Only by doing so can the player decide the fate of the cove—seal the Maw once more, or wield its dark power to claim dominion over the abyss.

tile_with_texture.name: black_maw_core
